name: Kitchen Explorer
description:
This is one of the scene that developed from my bitmap game called Kitchen Explorer. 

It's a game that tells the love and hate stories of us with kitchen. 

Use WASD keys to control the movement of your fried egg and help yourself  to have the breakfast. You will need to collect 5 things in order to have this breakfast.

Try to collect all the needs for eating a fired egg!!! Avoid touching  fires and ... sugar ewww. It will ruin the taste of your fried egg.

In this game,  I desgined a score counter,  different sound effects, and buttons. I used tile maps and animation. The only problem I met now is that I couldn't make the last scene re-enter into the start by button click.

I would also continue work on to convert my kitchen game into a larger series. Check the link below to see more about this game.

 https://cclab-portolio-zhijun.glitch.me/p7.html.
